author: Nfn They
description: Something good comes from something good.
summary: Here's a thought:Set up an incentive  program where locals are "rewarded" in some way for seeking care, and doing other things that help isolate disease.Find something that locals "value". Could be pots and pans, could be some money, Jewelry, or something that would motivate people to help themselves.A key element is choosing rewards that are significant to THEM. And they should be flexible depending on regions.Show them that good things happen for those who participate.Could be a great incentive...
title: "Incentives/Rewards" Program for Seeking Care.
